Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DpeReportCallback
    An interface to handle the JSON reports published by ERSAP.
    EngineCallback
    An interface to handle the reports published by ERSAP services.
    ErsapName
    Identifier of a ERSAP component.
    GenericCallback
    An interface to handle the JSON reports published by ERSAP.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseOrchestrator
    Base class for orchestration of applications.
    Composition
    A ERSAP composition of services.
    ContainerFilter
    A filter to select containers.
    ContainerName
    Unique identifier of a ERSAP container.
    ContainerRegistrationData
    The registration data of a running container.
    ContainerRuntimeData
    The runtime data of a running container.
    DataRingAddress
    The address of a ERSAP data-ring.
    DataRingTopic
    The address of a ERSAP data-ring.
    DpeFilter
    A filter to select DPEs.
    DpeName
    The name of a ERSAP DPE.
    DpeRegistrationData
    The registration data of a running DPE.
    DpeRuntimeData
    The runtime data of a running DPE.
    ErsapAddress
    The address where a ERSAP component is listening messages.
    ErsapFilters
    The standard filters to select ERSAP DPEs, containers or services.
    ErsapQueries
    Queries to the ERSAP registration/runtime database.
    ErsapQueries.CanonicalNameQuery<T>
    A query to get the names of the registered ERSAP components.
    ErsapQueries.DiscoveryQuery<T>
    A query to check if a ERSAP component is registered.
    ErsapQueries.ErsapQueryBuilder
    Builds a request to query the ERSAP registration and runtime database.
    ErsapQueries.RegistrationData<T>
    A query to get the registration data of a specific ERSAP component.
    ErsapQueries.RegistrationQuery<T>
    A query to get the registration data of the registered ERSAP components.
    ErsapQueries.RuntimeData<T>
    A query to get the runtime data of a specific ERSAP component.
    ErsapQueries.RuntimeQuery<T>
    A query to get the runtime data of the registered ERSAP components.
    ErsapRequests
    Requests to running ERSAP components.
    ErsapRequests.DeployContainerRequest
    A request to start a container.
    ErsapRequests.DeployServiceRequest
    A request to start a service.
    ErsapRequests.ExitRequest
    A request to stop a running ERSAP component.
    ErsapRequests.ServiceConfigRequest
    A request to configure a service.
    ErsapRequests.ServiceConfigRequestBuilder
    Builds a request to configure a service.
    ErsapRequests.ServiceExecuteRequest
    A request to execute a service composition.
    ErsapRequests.ServiceExecuteRequestBuilder
    Builds a request to execute a service or a composition.
    ErsapRequests.ServiceReportRequest
    A request to setup the reports of a service.
    ErsapSubscriptions
    Subscriptions for running ERSAP components.
    ErsapSubscriptions.BaseDpeReportSubscription
    A subscription to listen for JSON reports from the DPEs.
    ErsapSubscriptions.DpeReportSubscription
    A subscription to listen for JSON reports from the DPEs.
    ErsapSubscriptions.GlobalSubscriptionBuilder
    Builds a subscription to listen the different ERSAP DPE reports.
    ErsapSubscriptions.JsonReportSubscription
    A subscription to listen for JSON reports from the DPEs.
    ErsapSubscriptions.ServiceSubscription
    A subscription to listen for service reports (data, done, status).
    ErsapSubscriptions.ServiceSubscriptionBuilder
    Builds a subscription to listen the different ERSAP service reports.
    ErsapUtil
    Extra helper methods for ERSAP orchestrator and services.
    ServiceFilter
    A filter to select services.
    ServiceName
    Unique identifier of a ERSAP service.
    ServiceRegistrationData
    The registration data of a running service.
    ServiceRuntimeData
    The runtime data of a running service.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ErsapLang
    The supported languages for ERSAP components.
